title: Video: 'UFC 244 Countdown' for Jorge Masvidal vs. Nate Diaz 'BMF' showdown
text:
Did you miss the debut of “UFC 244 Countdown,” or just want to watch it again? Check out the main event preview now.

The segment takes a special look at the welterweight fight between Jorge Masvidal (34-13 MMA, 11-6 UFC) and Nate Diaz (20-11 MMA, 15-9 UFC), who meet for a newly created belt that will let the winner claim he’s the “BMF” – Baddest Mother(Expletive) – in the sport.

UFC 244 takes place Saturday at Madison Square Garden in New York. The main card airs on pay-per-view following prelims on ESPN2 and ESPN2/ESPN+/UFC Fight Pass.

“Countdown” goes behind the scenes with the two fighters, and you can watch the full segment above. And don’t miss the segment for the co-main event middleweight fight between Kelvin Gastelum and Darren Till below.
